answer_options: Poor Wi-Fi reception and weak battery
Display brightness and ambient light sensor

question_text: Which two actions are most likely to resolve system lag caused by too many background processes? (Select two)
explanation: Background apps and limited storage both contribute to sluggish performance. Managing these resources improves responsiveness.

question_text: A user complains of repeated app crashes and slowdowns on their mobile device. Which first step is recommended before hardware diagnostics?
answer_options: Check for software and app updates
correct_answer: Check for software and app updates
explanation: Software bugs are a common cause of crashes. Updates often contain performance and stability fixes.
